metadata.feature_description: Allows selection and configuration of Google Analytics account, web property, and data stream

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector is available in Connectors list

steps.action: Navigated to Persona Bar > Settings > Connectors
steps.expected: The 'Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector' or 'Evoq Google Analytics Connector' should appear in the list of available connectors
steps.actual: Only 'Google Analytics 4' connector is available. The Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector (which provides OAuth-based Account/Web Property/Data Stream configuration) is NOT installed.

steps.action: Listed all available connectors in the system
steps.expected: Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector should be present
steps.actual: Available connectors are: Amazon S3, Azure Storage, Box, Disqus, Dropbox, Facebook, Google Analytics 4, Google Tag Manager, HubSpot Forms, Kayako, LinkedIn, Mailchimp, Marketo, Optimizely, Twitter, UNC, Zendesk. The Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector is missing.

issues: The Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector (package name: Evoq.Content.GoogleAnalyticsConnector) is not installed in the test environment
Without this connector, the Google Analytics Account Configuration feature (OAuth authorization, Account/Web Property/Data Stream selection) cannot be tested

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify Google Analytics 4 connector does not have Account Configuration features

steps.action: Clicked Edit button on Google Analytics 4 connector
steps.expected: Configuration panel with Account dropdown, Web Property dropdown, and Data Stream dropdown should appear (as per the code in authorize.js)
steps.actual: Only a simple form with 'Measurement ID' text field and 'Track for Administrators' checkbox appeared. No Account, Web Property, or Data Stream dropdowns are present.

issues: The Google Analytics 4 connector in the test environment uses a simple configuration form, not the OAuth-based account configuration
The feature 'Google Analytics Account Configuration' requires the Evoq.Content.GoogleAnalyticsConnector package which is not installed

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Load and display available Google Analytics accounts

steps.action: Attempted to locate Account dropdown in connector configuration
steps.expected: Account dropdown should be displayed after OAuth authorization
steps.actual: The Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector is not installed. Cannot test this feature.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Select and change Google Analytics account

steps.action: Attempted to select an account from dropdown
steps.expected: Account dropdown should allow selection of different Google Analytics accounts
steps.actual: The Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector is not installed. No Account dropdown is available.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Load web properties for selected account

steps.action: Attempted to verify web properties loading for selected account
steps.expected: Web Property dropdown should populate when an account is selected
steps.actual: The Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector is not installed. No Web Property dropdown is available.

steps.action: Attempted to select a web property from dropdown
steps.expected: Web Property dropdown should allow selection of different web properties
steps.actual: The Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector is not installed. No Web Property dropdown is available.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Load data streams for selected property

steps.action: Attempted to verify data streams loading for selected web property
steps.expected: Data Stream dropdown should populate when a web property is selected
steps.actual: The Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector is not installed. No Data Stream dropdown is available.

steps.action: Attempted to select a data stream from dropdown
steps.expected: Data Stream dropdown should allow selection of different data streams
steps.actual: The Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector is not installed. No Data Stream dropdown is available.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify tracking ID is correctly set after configuration

steps.action: Attempted to verify tracking ID auto-population after data stream selection
steps.expected: Tracking ID (Measurement ID) should be automatically set when a data stream is selected
steps.actual: The Evoq Content Google Analytics Connector is not installed. The tracking ID auto-population feature (based on selected data stream's measurementId) cannot be tested.

observations: Code analysis confirms the 'Google Analytics Account Configuration' feature exists in the Evoq.Content.GoogleAnalyticsConnector package (authorize.js, ServicesController.cs)
The feature provides OAuth-based authorization and three cascading dropdowns: Account, Web Property, and Data Stream
When a data stream is selected, the tracking ID (measurementId) is automatically set
The Evoq.Content.GoogleAnalyticsConnector has a dependency on Evoq.GoogleAnalyticsConnector version 09.00.00
The test environment only has the DNN Platform 'Google Analytics 4' connector installed, which provides a simple Measurement ID input without OAuth integration
To test this feature, the Evoq.Content.GoogleAnalyticsConnector package must be installed, which is part of the Evoq Content/Enterprise edition
The Google Analytics Account Configuration feature requires external Google OAuth services to function properly
